articles.author: Owen Walker
articles.title: Five senior Credit Suisse executives leave in wake of UBS takeover - Financial Times
articles.description: Chief financial officer Dixit Joshi and general counsel Markus Diethelm are among departures
articles.content:
UBS has announced the departure of five of the most senior Credit Suisse executives just hours after sealing the official takeover of its Swiss rival.
Among those leaving are Dixit Joshi, chief fina… [+3190 chars]

articles.title: Novartis to buy Chinook for up to $3.5 bln in boost to late-stage pipeline - Reuters.com
articles.description: Novartis (NOVN.S) has agreed to acquire Seattle-based biotech firm Chinook Therapeutics (KDNY.O) for up to $3.5 billi…
articles.content: June 12 (Reuters) - Novartis (NOVN.S) has agreed to acquire Seattle-based biotech firm Chinook Therapeutics (KDNY.O) for up to $3.5 billion to boost its late-stage drug development line-up with a new… [+2293 chars]

articles.title: Fossil fuel company net zero plans 'largely meaningless,' report says - Reuters
articles.description: The number of fossil fuel companies setting net-zero emissions targets has risen sharply over the past year, but most fail to address key concerns, making them "largely meaningless", a report showed on Monday.
articles.content: LONDON, June 11 (Reuters) - The number of fossil fuel companies setting net-zero emissions targets has risen sharply over the past year, but most fail to address key concerns, making them "largely me… [+1902 chars]
